featured.text: Which of the following is true about the earliest traders in Zanzibar?
Traders from Asia had already visited the islands 900 years before the arrival of its first permanent settlers from the African mainland (around 1000 AD).
The islands soon attracted traders from different lands.
The earliest traders arrived around 900 AD. (B)

definition.zh_def: 交易者，指從事商品、股票或其他資產買賣的人。
definition.en_def: A person who buys and sells goods, stocks, or other assets for profit.
definition.example: The trader made a significant profit by investing in technology stocks.
